summary: The Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU) is a super-popular series of superhero movies based on Marvel comic books. With 34 films already released and more on the way, it's the highest-grossing film franchise ever, making over $31 billion worldwide. The MCU has different phases, with each film building on the next, and features lots of famous actors. Kevin Feige has produced every movie, with other producers like Amy Pascal and the Russo brothers also involved. The MCU started in 2008 with "Iron Man" and has since released movies like "Avengers: Endgame," which became the highest-grossing film at the time. The franchise continues to grow with new phases and TV shows, all part of an exciting shared universe.
title: List of Marvel Cinematic Universe films
